website_summaries.verdict: A great match for professionals wanting a comfortable office chair with an atypical model.
pros: Compact chair fits in a wide variety of spaces
Seat height is adjustable, and also swivels
Steel frame ensures a longer life for the product
cons: A better chair for more petite people

customer_reviews.title: The Container Store chair has better lumbar support and seems to provide better support in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my office. I also bought a bungie low back adjustable office chair for my sewing room from the Container Store. I much prefer the one from the Container Store. This one is a little taller, heavier, and the front part of the seat tilts slightly upward. The Container Store chair has better lumbar support and seems to provide better support in general.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Milo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair!  Super ez to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This bungie chair is really comfy to use, and took about 5 min to assemble (all bungies are pre-attached). I tested this at the container store (As many others have) and the chairs are very similar, it seems their chair is a bit larger but not by much. I really like this chair and wanted to buy another one but NO WAY they raised the price for some reason to nearly double what I paid just 3 days later!! Now I am going to the container store to buy the other chair!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Get the one that reclines and has arm rests
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. The height is fine, but the area of the seat is really small. I feel like I'm sitting on the edge of the chair even though my back is all the way against the back of the chair. And I'm only 5'8". Plus, the chair doesn't recline. Very uncomfortable. Feels like the chair is designed for someone 5'5" or shorter. The one with the arm rests at the Container Store is way more comfortable. The seat is bigger and the chair reclines.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, especially in hot weather.
customer_reviews.text: If you need to sit at a desk for several hours, it is hard to bet the comfort of this chair. What I like about it, is that even in warm weather, you stay cool. I have ordered four of them over the years.
customer_reviews.author: GEGonder

customer_reviews.title: OK sitting on bungees
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s a comfortable chair to use at a sewing machine. The straps are a little uncomfortable at first. I had expected the flat rubber straps like the ones used on truck covers but these are round bungees. So far, satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Pasco

customer_reviews.title: nice simple chair
customer_reviews.text: nice simple chair. Not sure if the bungees are good for circulation though. Its great for temperature and breathing but my legs fell asleep often. I ended up going back to my broken down chair this was to replace because I need arm wrests and a reclining feature because I am incredibly lazy and have the worst posture and just like to slob out on the computer. This was my pipe dream of sitting with good posture, the kale of the chair world but not quite a bosu ball for my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this chair for 2 months and the piston is already shot! The chair will not stay at a certain height any longer, so every time you stand up it raises to the highest setting and when you sit down it lowers all the way. Not good when you sit and don't expect that!! I'm afraid someone will end up on the floor one of these days since it's on wheels. This really saddens me because I have a similar bungie chair that I've had for years and it's still in great shape. I would not suggest buying this one!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: my old "office chair" was making me miserable so i finally decided to replace it. i had sat in one of these style chair (may have been the same brand) at a store and really enjoyed it. of course, found it cheaper on amazon. chair is very comfortable. the bungies kinda form to your body. this model does not recline, which i like because it keeps me sitting upright. the height adjustment is good. it goes a lot higher than i thought it would. however the lowest setting is just right for where i use it. great chair. i would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli A. LeBeouf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome back support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: We had the chair assembled in a few minutes and I love it!! It gives me the back support and comfort I need to sew for a few hours. The lack of arms makes it much easier to use for sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great chair that you can sit in comfortably all day while working at your desk!
customer_reviews.author: rdkmills

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable. Quality construction. Came a day early. Love this chair.
customer_reviews.author: KIM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chairs! Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Briefly: 1- Outstanding and different design. I got in love with them as soon as I saw them 2- Very easy to assemble (no instructions requiered) 3- Very comfortable I purchased four and as soon as I got them tried to purchase 4 more but they were not available. I let people know about it and found them the next day here. I am still waiting for the next four and would like a similar design without wheels for my reception area. They are great! My secretaries and clients love them, too :)
customer_reviews.author: Freeflyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not seeing, and definitely not feeling what's so great about a bungie chair
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so many people who bought this style chair or similar models in the product line couldn't say enough things about it. Well, not this guy. I just couldn't find comfort in any aspect of this chair. I should of known to try it out before I purchased it. But that's why we have returns and my hunt for "the chair" continues.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, easy to assemble, good looking
customer_reviews.text: Update: After 5 years, still works great and looks great. I sat in this chair at The Container Store, but purchased it from Amazon. his chair came in 4 parts and took me 5 minutes to assemble. The chair is comfortable, looks like it should last up to my office use, and is attractive. A different, novelty look makes all my co-workers want to come sit in it to try it out. A couple have expressed interest in this as their next chair.
customer_reviews.author: OC-Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great support for my back, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great support for your back, but a little hard on your bum, and if you like to sit with a foot under your bum, the cords hurt your ankles after a while. That aside, I'm happy with the purchase. It looks sharp and my back thanks me.
customer_reviews.author: BWilusz

customer_reviews.title: Liteweight great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I sew for hours and after this arrived I had no bottom ache or numbness from sitting so long.
customer_reviews.author: Wendyjeans

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, people think I am crazy but its lightweight, and the seat is not very deep which I love because I am only 5'4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! This is the most comfortable office chair I have ever sat in. My legs fall asleep often after sitting for a period of time, but with this chair I don't seem to have that problem. Perhaps it's the bungee cords that keep from cutting of circulation or something. The chair was easy to put together. My home office leans towards contemporary so this chair looks great. Very light weight but not flimsy or unstable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair
customer_reviews.text: I'd say this chair is definitely worth the money. It seems sturdy, and well made. Easy to put together, and is comfortable. I wanted something with ventilation all around, and this one accomplishes that, while still being a decent chair. One thing to watch out for, are the nuts/washers going a bit loose every now and then - just keep the hex wrench handy and everything's golden.
customer_reviews.author: exlibris

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice in the room. I had an executive chair and this looks much nicer actually. Easy to put together and SUPER comfy. I have issues with chronic tailbone pain and this doesn't bother it all. Also the cats were tearing the hell out of my other chair... this one they can't even get up on because theres basically nothing for them to stand on :-)... BONUS!
customer_reviews.author: Jayfo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair - One Safety Issue
customer_reviews.text: This a a nice chair, but there's a safety issue. The chair pumped to full height has a nice bounce, but if you use your hands to hold the sides of the chair as you sit down and leave them there, the seat comes down on your fingers, causing your fingers to be painfully crushed. This is important to be aware of for adults and especially children who like to play with swivel or bouncing chairs.
customer_reviews.author: S. DozSam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small desk
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and well constructed. Chair is made in Taiwan and the fit and finish are superior to similar Chinese products. The green is more muted than appears in the website picture. I am very pleased with the purchase. The chair does not look too large for the small office desk where I have it placed. As the chair is smaller than an executive style seat, it may not fit the larger frames of folks who exceed ~ 225 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Feels weird but you get used to it
customer_reviews.text: It'll feel like no other chair and will provide ample support. It may "feel" harder than most chairs but will not actually be applying pressure to your butt/back areas in the way a normal chair would. This spreads out the PSI over the entire surface rather than central locations. Good if you sit for prolonged periods of time. Also, cats will not sit on this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lee

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Little bit harder then I thought, but its light weight and simple. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sina Serati

customer_reviews.title: Band chair
customer_reviews.text: My husband enjoys the comfort yet support the the chair gives
customer_reviews.author: feistyfox

customer_reviews.title: this is the best desk chair for my back that I've ever had ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars just because it has zero reclinability. otherwise, this is the best desk chair for my back that I've ever had (and I've tried many). I only wish I'd gotten the same model with armrests.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few minutes to assemble. Rolls well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Bungewe cord office/computer chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very comfortable. It doesn't bottom out like other chairs that are used for office and computer. Only thing that I miss is that this chair doesn't recline at all and is fixed in the upright position. Other than that, it is a good chair. I gave it four stars out of five only because it can't recline.
customer_reviews.author: Bstnwhaler

customer_reviews.title: There Have Been Some Funny Reviews...
customer_reviews.text: ...but this one is serious. Easy to put together (took seriously like 4 minutes), looks terrific, and is really, really comfortable, The price might be a touch on the high side, but the look is terrific and the comfort is undeniable. We will definitely buy more for the office.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow for my legs but no more back pain
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a lot of pain in my tailbone due to many hours sitting down at work. I love this chair for avoiding that. The only drawback is that it is a little narrow and the outside of my legs keep rubbing with the hard part of the frame. It was super easy to put together, around 15 min.
customer_reviews.author: Peruviangirl4you

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Provides great support for low back. Reasonably priced, too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mikow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortanle alternative to standard chair
customer_reviews.text: I see this often in shows and office supply catalogs lately so its definitely in. If you have a wide seat it isn't going to be for you. I regret not getting the one with the arms. Colors bright and cords very comfortable and Airy.
customer_reviews.author: shopping at midnight

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: The guy that wrote the review about farting in the chair sold it for me. After purchasing I have to say i can sit on it for hours before my butt goes to sleep and i have to walk around a bit. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Bungee office chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair has made such a hit, that we sent for a 2nd one. It's very comfortable and everybody wants to sit in it to try it out...then they want one, too. Arrived quickly and was very easy to put together. We would order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Terho

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, best i've had. Springy, firm, good back height, smooth, ventilated, light, very comfortable for hours at the desk and computer. I'd buy another in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: June Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Bungee office chair
customer_reviews.text: We were so pleased with this 'bungee' chair, that we got a second one. Everyone who sees it and tries it out, wants one. The chair arrived quickly and in excellent condition. I would order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Terho

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy chair for long-term use.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for a few months, and so far it's been an excellent product. While not the most luxurious computer chair, it's comfortable and offers so much support that I can sit in it for hours without any noticeable aches or pains. It has endured hundreds of hours of use, and shows no signs of wear and tear. My only concern is that it might be ideal for larger people - As a broad-legged guy, my thighs come to rest on the sides of the bungee supports, just inside the metal framing.
customer_reviews.author: TwigTech

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chair if very comfortable and provides support. Bought one and then ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Davidoff

customer_reviews.title: Great little seat!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these at a Container Store and liked it so well, we ordered one from Amazon for our granddaughter's college room. Very comfortable, even for hefties like me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best chairs!!
customer_reviews.text: Prevents hot spots on legs from sitting all darn day :-)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable every day chair
customer_reviews.text: I chose 5 stars because this chair is quite comfortable and very easy to sit in. The bungee actually is supportive and the back keeps your posture good for extended periods of time. On a style-side, it looks great and a great conversation started. I'm probably going to pick up another chair soon as I'd like all of my office chairs to feel comfortable and looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin J

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful chair for the price. Great for your back and posture. I have recommended to several of my friends and they loved it as well. Who would thing bungie ropes could be so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JBEE

customer_reviews.title: Best small desk chair ever!
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy with this chair. Very comfortable for long periods of time. Simple to assemble. I'm 5' 8" and 155 lbs and fit in this chair with a little room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This chair is incredibly comfortable!!!! I am pleased and amazed! I would recommend this chair to anyone looking for a desk chair. I plan on getting another one for my sewing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Granny K

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: While this is quite easily the ugliest piece of furniture I've ever purchased, it's really very functional and comfortable. I'm very small so office chairs are often just not quite right for me. However, this has proven very comfortable. In addition, it arrived in great shape and was incredibly easy to set up. For the price, it's an incredible product. I just have to figure out an attractive option for transforming it into something that doesn't look like a discarded lawn chair.
customer_reviews.author: MsRoxie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had a similar chair and really likes it. I needed a new smaller desk chair and have been very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two of These Wonderful Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are lightweight, take up very little room and provide good support. From a guy with back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Scarface

customer_reviews.title: great comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: this chair is lightweight but solid. Very comfortable! I have bought 3 of them because I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Carman

customer_reviews.title: comfortable lightweight chair
customer_reviews.text: this chair is lightweight but solid. Very comfortable! I have bought 3 of them because I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Carman

customer_reviews.title: great lightweight chair
customer_reviews.text: this chair is lightweight but solid. Very comfortable! I have bought 3 of them because I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Carman

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, very comfortable and looks great. I saw this first and tried it out at the local Container Store but they didn't carry the RED color I wanted and found it at Amazon. It is in my 9 year old's room and it seems to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: VPR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, inexpensive, ergonomic chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair for the price, infinitely more comfortable than any so-called "ergonomic" chair that my workplace has provided me with. Good quality, quick delivery. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chair is very comfortable when I sew quilts
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable when I sew quilts. The back can be removed when I travel to quilt retreats. It's everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Foster

customer_reviews.title: Bungie office chair
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution for me - something small and not difficult to maneuvre. It doesn't stick way out into the room. I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: D. McMackin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and compact
customer_reviews.text: This desk chair is awesome. It's incredibly comfortable and compact. Without the armests, it doesn't stick out from the desk, it fits nicely under it. It looks modern and complex, but the setup is actually incredibly easy. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ35

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable office chair with a bit more modern interest than the average office chair. I use it in my living room home office desk. I like that it doesn't have arms and has a very simple profile.
customer_reviews.author: Lifelong Learning

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful  Chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased online for a price $50 - $100 less than I could get it locally and was in the color I wanted. Not only is it easy to put together, it is truly a comfortable, back-supportive chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A. Wiget

customer_reviews.title: Modern Chair With Pop
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking office chair that fits with any style of office. The green color gives the office decor a pop. Comfortable chair and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bosskitt

customer_reviews.title: Tiny chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is built well and this bungee system is comfortable but this particular model is pretty small. It may be ok for women who sit with their legs crossed or for children but if you are a man, don't get this unless you like to sit with your legs tightly closed the whole time. I am 5'11, 175 lbs and I had to return this. The measurements in the description are accurate but because of the bungee system you cannot sit on about 2-3 inches of it on each of the sides and you cannot sit with your legs open over the sides (comfortably).
customer_reviews.author: Docta Peppa

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Functional Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fun and functional. It's light and modernizes a classic room. Very comfortable. I'm glad I purchased this chair.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair cats don't sit in
customer_reviews.text: This chair is comfortable for humans, but cats don't jump up on it because of the bungie cord construction. Great if you want a fur-free chair.
customer_reviews.author: PriscillaT

customer_reviews.title: Best Chair
customer_reviews.text: I got this chair for myself and my wife, we love them. TO express the fullness of quality and pleasure found in this chair I will simply expose my cherished single beloved feature of this chair, which is..... You will never have to lean to the left.....or the right......or any other direction.........to rip a fatty...Your stinky smellies will simply pass right on beneath you, on to sail the world around you. There is no better reason to buy and use this chair everyday of your life, and you know it....deep down, you know it.
customer_reviews.author: Dreal

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, unique design
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to find this chair. I am very happy with the purchase. It's quite unique looking, and extremely comfortable which I didn't expect. It's solid built, good quality, light weight, and fits my height (5'4"). I recommend this chair for anyone is looking for a small, light weight, contemporary style office chair.
customer_reviews.author: HYM

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun and comfy chair. Its a great chair for you desk and works just as weel as those "ergonomic" chairs for a fraction of the price. Easy to set up also. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Alfred Bakken

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it six stars!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish I had found this chair months ago--Perfection...and, so easy to put together. Great seller and I'd order from them again should I need another chair.
customer_reviews.author: asiana

product_meta.title: Euro Style Bungie Low Back Adjustable Office Chair, Black Bungies with Aluminum Frame
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBungie goes hi-tech. Or is it lo-tech? Either way, this is the Bungie made for fun. Blue. Green. Pink. Red. Any color loops you choose, this one is bound to brighten up an office or a kid's room. Game on!
feature_bullets: Bungie goes hi-tech. Or is it lo-tech? Either way, this is the Bungie made for fun. Blue. Green. Pink. Red. Any color loops you choose, this one is bound to brighten up an office or a kid's room. Game on!
Round bungie cords seat and back with black nylon fittings
Powder coated steel frame and black nylon base with casters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars118 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
